alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 7:11PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Bradley, south central Cleveland and central Calhoun Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 710 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hampton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warren... Hampton... Harrell... Ellisville... Weeks... Tipton... Hampton Municipal Airport... Marks Mill State Park... Hebron... Highland Industrial Park... Banks... Tinsman... Delhi... Chambersville... Locust Bayou... Orlando... Woodberry... New Edinburg... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.
